meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7285.

td.p: Michael Koh, a supervisory analyst from Irvine, California
Amy Hart, a latent print examiner originally from Chicago, Illinois
Andrew Pau, an assistant professor from Amherst, Ohio (whose 5-day cash winnings total $136,201)

tr.td: CHILDREN'S BOOK TITLES
OVER-THE-COUNTER MEDICATIONS
CLASSICAL MUSIC
I GOT A 5-LETTER WORD FOR YA
YOUR FACE IS ON THE MONEY
FATHERLY TV

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '(Alex: Obviously swimming across a famous body of water.)
...
(Alex: [To Michael] Yes, Lord [*] swimming the Hellespont.)
...
(Alex: ...we come to Andrew, who\'s looking kind of self-satisfied. Isn\'t he? Did he come up with [*]? Oh, yes. What--what had you written before?)
(Andrew: I was starting with Shelley...)
(Alex: Ah, you picked the wr--)
(Andrew: ...\'cause he drowned.)
(Alex: Yeah. Yes. But he wasn\'t swimming the Hellespont.)
AmyWho is Cook?
$9,150
MichaelWho is Lord Byron?
$3,000
AndrewWho is She Byron?
$16,801
Byron')
